title: Bleed for Past
overview: The emergence of an underground drug trafficking ring plunges minor gang leader Old Dog and local crime boss Third Brother into a life-and-death crisis. A reckless young man named Dongzi becomes unwittingly entangled in the turmoil, rising to become Old Dog's most trusted lieutenant. The mysterious sudden death of gang patriarch Master Ge creates a power vacuum, triggering a bloody struggle as ruthless contenders battle for dominance while shadowy forces manipulate events from behind the scenes. Dongzi's true identity appears to conceal deeper complexities.  In this maelstrom of gunfire and betrayal, the brotherhood between Old Dog and Dongzi - forged through shared survival - faces ultimate betrayal within a blood-soaked labyrinth of intrigue. An earth-shattering conspiracy unfolds. On the carnage-strewn battlefield where human nature undergoes ultimate trials, only the survivors will write the final chapter of this high-stakes gambit...
